channel.title: Picking up an item in 1 click
channel.description: Can someone please help me I need to know how to make it so my players dont have to click 1000 times to pick up an item. I looked all over mopar and google for a tutorial I cant find anything so if you can redirect me to one or help me on the coding please do.

item.title: Picking up an item in 1 click
item.dc:creator: @Torax1 Torax™
item.description:
@Torax1 wrote:

I’m pretty sure its not client sided. Its server sided.

Read full topic
item.source: Picking up an item in 1 click
